title: Learning Control Design for Rotating Systems: Practical Application Based on Iterative Learning Control

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental principles of control systems and basic linear algebra knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical learning environment for office/administrative professionals, utilizing smartphone-based LMS and flexible scheduling

learning_goals: Understanding the principles of iterative learning control and explaining design procedures applicable to rotational systems.
Verifying through simulation methods to minimize tracking errors using periodic parameter update laws.
Analyzing the stability and convergence characteristics of learning control algorithms for nonlinear/high-order systems.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
